name: Flow By AkarFire
description:
A game for Tiny Tubers Game Jam, created by AkarFire. Jam theme: Pipes And Tubes.

Total Time: 41 hour 50 minutes

Solve puzzles by building different pipe systems. If you need a game build for a platform other than windows just message me, we will figure that out :)

The game was created by a solo game developer AkarFire:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEaVzVDDaIsn4TovmX7OuOQ/featured

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/rBeKSANvSW

Music:

Dreamer by Hazy https://soundcloud.com/hazy_music Music provided by https://www.plugnplaymusic.net

Wonder by Hazy https://soundcloud.com/hazy_music Music provided by https://www.plugnplaymusic.net

Letting Go by Hazy https://soundcloud.com/hazy_music Music provided by https://www.plugnplaymusic.net
